## MemoruOptions.respectGC property

Whether to respect GC events when deciding to rotate the cache. If true, the cache won't rotate during or immediately after GC. Requires memoryStats to be configured with monitorGC: true

**Signature:**

```typescript
respectGC?: boolean;
```
